error.api_required: Please select an API to connect your account.

api.description:
Go to **[Library](https://console.developers.google.com/apis/library)** and **Enable** the following APIs.  
- [Google Calendar API](https://console.developers.google.com/apis/library/calendar-json.googleapis.com)  
- [Google People API](https://console.developers.google.com/apis/library/people.googleapis.com)
api.title: APIs & Services

user.description:
**[Create OAuth client ID](https://console.developers.google.com/apis/credentials/oauthclient)** and enter the **Client ID** and **Client Secret** below.  

**Application type:** Web application  
**Name:** Home Assistant  
**Authorize redirect URIs:** [[YOUR_HA_EXTERNAL_URL]]
user.title: APIs & Services

init.description: Go to **[Library](https://console.developers.google.com/apis/library)** and **Enable** the required APIs.
init.title: APIs & Services
